Choose which Series to start with as well as which Series will be present in your runs.
Your Hindrance level is determined by the proportion of your deck made up of negative-valued cards. Cards valued less than -2 have a larger impact on this number.
Your Affinity level is determined by the sum of the frequency of each Affinity that occurs more than 2 times in your deck.
You have unsaved changes to your loadout that will be lost upon leaving. Are you sure you want to leave this menu?
#pLeft-Click to open the editor. | #pRight-Click to enable or disable #yCustom #yCards.
View and manage your #yAugments.{0} || {#o:Right-Click to learn more.}
Most Attacks and Skills have a single unconditional effect.
Most Attacks and Skills gain a secondary conditional effect alongside their original effect, but lose damage, [Block], or [THP] equal to their cost + 1.

#oLeft-Click to play the displayed card. | #oRight-Click to change this card. | Press #o{0} to cycle through playable cards.
{#g:Left-Click to gain 1 Last Affinity and {0} {1} Attunement}
{0} cards deal #b+{1}% damage on #yCombust and give #b+{1}% [Block] on #yRedox.
{#o:Click this to Morph this pair into {0}.}
Tags are shown on the top-right corner of a card.
A card's #yAffinities are shown above its name. [A-A] counts as #b1 of every #yAffinity. [A-W] counts as no #yAffinity. In tooltips, [A-W] is used as a shorthand for #yAffinities in general.
To play a #ySummon card, drag it onto a #ySummon #ySlot (shown by the flashing ovals that appear upon clicking on the card).

The #yAffinities of a card are shown above its name. [A-A] signifies that the card has all #yAffinities. [A-W] signifies that the card does not have any #yAffinity. In tooltips, [A-W] is also used as a shorthand to refer to #yAffinities in general.

Whenever you play a card, the #yAuras matching its #yAffinities gain #b1 stack. This gain is doubled if any of its #yAffinities matches the #yPromoted #yAura. #yPromoted #yAuras are denoted by a green arrow next to them. Cards matching the #yPromoted #yAura will glow yellow.
Once per turn, you may click on the icon of an #yAura to activate its effect for the turn. Active #yAuras have a green border. Hover over the icons to show a tooltip explaining effects of each power.

#yAuras gain #b1 #yLevel for every #b10 stacks gained. Each #yLevel gives #b+1 damage and [Block] to cards matching its #yAffinity and boosts its activation effect (the effectiveness formulas are shown in the power's tooltip).

#yElemental #yDebuffs include [Burning], [Flowed], [Chilled], and [Stoned] and are removed at the end of each round. Each #yDebuff is associated with the #yAffinity that it shares an icon with. [Burning] -> [A-R], [Flowed] -> [A-G], [Chilled] -> [A-B], [Stoned] -> [A-O]. Hover over their buttons to see their effects.

The arrows show the two types of interactions between the #yElemental #yDebuffs that occur when a card with the former #yDebuff's #yAffinity targets a creature with the latter #yDebuff. Blue-gray arrows signify #yCombusts. Brown arrows signify #yRedoxes. | Once per turn, you can click on an arrow to change its interaction type for the turn.

#yCombusts and #yRedoxes grant #yReactions. #yCombusts provide a damage bonus to the card being played, while #yRedoxes provide a [Block] bonus to it. | Spend #yReactions by clicking on a #yDebuff's button to increase its #yLevel (signified by the blue number on each #yElemental #yDebuff). #yLevels increase a #yDebuff's passive effect as well as its #yCombust and #yRedox bonuses. Each #yLevel costs more than the last.

The #yLast #yAffinity is the #yAffinity of the last card played, and is signfied by the #yAffinity symbol with a silver border. The #yAffinities to the right of it signify previous #yLast #yAffinities.

The #yPolarity meter is the large circular button to the left of your #yLast #yAffinities. The value of this meter is equal to the number of [A-Y] #yLast #yAffinities minus the number of [A-P] #yLast #yAffinities. [A-S] #yLast #yAffinities do not affect this meter's value.

A #yMatch occurs when you play a card with the #yLast #yAffinity, granting #b1 #yResolve. | At maximum #yResolve, clicking on the #yPolarity meter will reset your #yResolve to gain #b1 #yLast #yAffinity and #b2 stacks of an #yAttunement #yPower dependent on your current #yPolarity. #yAttunement #yPowers increase the damage and [Block] of cards with its #yAffinity.

#yThe #yConjurer, #yThe #yDecider, and #yThe #yEternal have a #ySimple #yMode toggle that determines the effects of cards you encounter. || #bSimple #bMode #bOn: Most cards have a single unconditional effect and have higher damage and Block. Recommended for casual play. | #oSimple #oMode #oOff: Most cards gain a secondary conditional effect but lose some damage and Block. Recommended for experienced players. || You can check its effects on each card by using the #ySimple #yMode toggle in the Card Compendium screen.

#yThe #yConjurer and #yThe #yDecider's starting loadouts can be customized through the #yLoadouts menu. In this menu, you may customize your character's starting deck and relics. Upon reaching #yAscension 7, you may also customize your character's starting attributes.

#yConjurer and #yDecider cards can be slotted with #yAugments to alter their effects. #yAugments may be obtained at the end of boss fights, from breaking cards with the #yMagic #yEraser starting relic, and as rewards from certain events. | The available slots for #yAugments on a card are shown on the left-hand border of the card, underneath its energy cost.

To view your #yAugments, click on the #yAugment icon on the top bar. You may then click on individual #yAugments to apply them to a card in your deck. || You may also slot #yAugments onto a card by clicking on its #yAugment icons in its pop-up view mode in your master deck. Here, you can either click on an empty #yAugment slot to put an eligible #yAugment in that slot, or click on a filled #yAugment slot to retrieve that #yAugment. || You may insert and remove #yAugment as many times as you wish at any time, but changes will not be applied to cards in the current battle.
Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
Create new custom cards or edit ones that you've already created.
These properties apply to ALL forms of this card.
If checked: Only the first effect will be used if the conditions are met, and only the second effect will be used if it wasn't.
If checked: Only one of the listed conditions is required to activate the effects. Otherwise, all listed conditions are required.
Select the Color to copy this card to.
{#o:Left-click} a card to edit it. {#o:Right-click} a card for more options.
Custom cards can be obtained in #yCustom #yRuns with the #yEnable #yCustom #yCards option selected or through the #oobtaincustom command in Basemod's console.
Update the custom card list to reflect the cards present in your custom cards folder. | This will remove any cards that have been moved out of the custom card folder.
You may change a card's form when you upgrade it at a campfire. All forms share the same #yPrimary #yAttributes, but their other attributes and effects may differ.
Choose the image to use for this card's portrait
Flags qualify cards for certain checks (e.g. counting as a #yStrike for {#y:Perfected Strike}).
Tags affect the way the player interacts with a card (e.g. what happens after they play it). Most tags are removed after activation.
In the dropdown, the left-hand number signfies the number of uses the tag has while un-upgraded, while the right-hand number determines the number of uses for the upgraded card.
Affinities and Series can be used for checks and effects from custom characters.
Conditions determine when the card's effects are allowed activate.
Effects are activated when the card is played, unless otherwise modified by a condition,
Modifiers affect the output of the card's effect. They do NOT affect conditions.
Triggers determine the times at which a power will activate. Conditions are applied after triggers.
Turn Delay determines the number of turns that will pass before this effect is actually used.
When Choices is above 0, the user will need to choose which of these sub-effects to use when playing this card.
If checked, only the first effect will be used if the conditions are met, and only the second effect will be used if it wasn't.
If checked, only one of the listed conditions is required to activate the effects. Otherwise, all listed conditions are required.
Select a file from your computer or paste an image from your clipboard.
The highlighted portion of the image will be saved. Drag the image to reposition it. Use the scrollbar to zoom in or out.
Permanently increase your maximum hand size by 1. Can be obtained up to 3 times across all card effects.
Scry (You draw from left to right).
